jumbotron.heading: Hi there, I am Hieu Kim
jumbotron.subHeading: I am a Full Stack Developer with 4 years of experience in developing web applications. I am passionate about learning new technologies and building scalable applications.

hbl.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
hbl.p1: Improved Remittance payment efficiency by 90% by revamping the legacy Remittance processing software into modern, feature-rich Remittance processing solution.
hbl.p2: Conducted 6-day MEAN Stack training for 26 developers with varying levels of experience.
hbl.p3: Developed 50+ end-to-end applications using JavaScript, Node.js, .NET Web API, React, Angular, TypeScript and Django. Performed CI/CD by DevOps, GitLab, and GitHub Actions.

hbl2.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
hbl2.p1: Reduced manual efforts by 95% by automating the process of electronic Proceeds Realization Certificates (ePRC) generation by developing reusable APIs.
hbl2.p2: Conducted 6-day MEAN Stack training for 26 developers with varying levels of experience.
hbl2.p3: Implemented CI/CD pipelines and workflows using GitLab, GitHub Actions, OpenShift pipelines, DevSecOps. Used Docker for containerization and Kubernetes for Orchestration.
